name: Sublime Salmon Power Bowl

ingredients.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or broth mix of your choice

preparation: Peel and cube yam. Place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 4 min.
Meanwhile drain and rinse lentils. Drain salmon and break apart chunks using a fork.
Remove steamer from microwave; add lentils and broth mix. Stir to combine. Cover; microwave on high an additional 1–2 min until lentils are heated through and yams are tender.
Once cooked, divide yam mixture between four bowls. Arrange salmon, arugula, berries, and slaw mix in bowls. Drizzle dressing on top; top with additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Switch it up—use fresh seasonal fruit such as peaches, blackberries, raspberries, or cherries.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
